body_html:
@peterjc123

  1. You are right. but the multiprocessing issue is the same as in python 3.x
  2. python2.7 + vc2015 can solve this problem
  3. ...

In python 3.x,
when we call

Data.DataLoader(dataset=torch_dataset, batch_size=BATCH_SIZE, shuffle=True, num_workers=2,)

, it is the same error.

body:
@peterjc123 
1. You are right. but the multiprocessing issue is the same as in python 3.x
2. python2.7 + vc2015 can solve this problem
3. ...

In python 3.x, 
when we call
```python
Data.DataLoader(dataset=torch_dataset, batch_size=BATCH_SIZE, shuffle=True, num_workers=2,)
```
, it is the same error.
